biography_text: ARMSTRONG, Kelly, a Representative from North Dakota; born in Dickinson, Stark County, N.Dak., October 8, 1976; graduated from Dickinson High School, Dickinson, N.Dak., 1995; B.A., University of North Dakota, Grand Forks, N.Dak., 2001; J.D., University of North Dakota, Grand Forks, N.Dak., 2003; lawyer; business executive; member of the North Dakota state senate, 2013-2018; chairman, North Dakota Republican Party, 2015-2018; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Sixteenth Congress (January 3, 2019-present).

post_secondary_degrees.institution: University of North Dakota, Grand Forks, N.Dak.
University of North Dakota, Grand Forks, N.Dak.
